QuestData.Title: Steward at Work
QuestData.Description:
Stewards are useful for many reasons.
They keep Bastion tidy, fix anything broken, and offer unrivaled companionship and support.
Your new steward assistant should be able to repair the beacon. Then you can summon the Polemarch to Hero's Rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Summon Steward to fix the Beacon of Invocation, then use it to summon Polemarch Adrestes.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Polemarch Adrestes in Hero's Rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Kalisthene has vouched for you by allowing usage of the beacon. For that reason, you have my attention.
